How to learn AWS from basics?

{
  "skill_tree": {
    "title": "AWS Fundamentals",
    "prerequisites": [
      "Basic Cloud Computing Concepts"
    ],
    "learning_path": [
      {
        "order": 1,
        "topic": "Fundamentals",
        "resources": [
          "AWS Documentation",
          "Cloud Academy Training"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Understand Cloud concepts",
          "Learn AWS global infrastructure",
          "Understand Regions and Availability Zones",
          "Explore AWS Pricing models"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 2,
        "topic": "Core AWS Services",
        "resources": [
          "AWS EC2 Guide",
          "AWS S3 Documentation",
          "AWS RDS Guide",
          "AWS IAM Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Launch and manage EC2 instances",
          "Store and retrieve data using S3",
          "Set up and manage relational databases with RDS",
          "Manage access and permissions with IAM"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 3,
        "topic": "Networking",
        "resources": [
          "AWS VPC Guide",
          "AWS Route 53 Documentation",
          "AWS ELB Guide",
          "AWS CloudFront Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Configure and manage VPCs",
          "Set up DNS with Route 53",
          "Implement load balancing with ELB",
          "Use CloudFront for content delivery"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 4,
        "topic": "Security and Monitoring",
        "resources": [
          "AWS Security Groups Guide",
          "AWS CloudWatch Documentation",
          "AWS CloudTrail Guide",
          "AWS Config Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Implement security groups and NACLs",
          "Monitor resources with CloudWatch",
          "Track API activity with CloudTrail",
          "Assess compliance with AWS Config"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 5,
        "topic": "Serverless Computing",
        "resources": [
          "AWS Lambda Guide",
          "AWS API Gateway Documentation",
          "AWS DynamoDB Guide",
          "AWS Step Functions Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Build serverless applications with Lambda",
          "Create APIs with API Gateway",
          "Use DynamoDB for NoSQL databases",
          "Orchestrate workflows with Step Functions"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 6,
        "topic": "Automation and Orchestration",
        "resources": [
          "AWS Elastic Beanstalk Guide",
          "AWS CloudFormation Documentation",
          "AWS CodeDeploy/CodePipeline Guide",
          "AWS OpsWorks Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Deploy applications with Elastic Beanstalk",
          "Automate infrastructure with CloudFormation",
          "Implement CI/CD with CodeDeploy/CodePipeline",
          "Manage applications with OpsWorks"
        ]
      },
      {
        "order": 7,
        "topic": "Storage Solutions",
        "resources": [
          "AWS EBS Documentation",
          "AWS Glacier Guide",
          "AWS Storage Gateway Documentation",
          "AWS FSx Documentation"
        ],
        "milestones": [
          "Manage block storage with EBS",
          "Archive data with Glacier",
          "Integrate on-premises storage with Storage Gateway",
          "Use FSx for high-performance file systems"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "dependencies": [
      "Networking Fundamentals",
      "Linux Fundamentals"
    ]
  }
